text: hyn ja'at alrusul eadana wthmwd, yatabie baeduhum bedana mtwalyn, yamrwnhm bieibadat allah wahdah la sharik lh, qaluu lrslhm: law sha' rabuna 'an nwhdh wala naebud min dunih shyyana ghyrh, la'anzal 'iilayna malayikat min alsama' rusulana bima tadeunana 'ilyh, walam yrslkm wa'antum bashar mthlna, fa'iinaa bima arslkm allah bih 'iilayna min al'iiman biallah wahdah jahdwn
